As i posted in the summary, the attachments are saved incomplete/corrupted to disk when I close Thunderbird while saving. This happens only using IMAP protocol.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open a mail with an attachment (preferably a big one to have enough time).
2. Save the file to disk (you'll see a progress bar).
3. While saving, close Thunderbird.
4. Now you have a corrupted file :(.

Actual Results:  
The files are corrupted.

Expected Results:  
A correctly saved file, even if I try to close Thunderbird while saving.
comments.creator: gustavocipriani@yahoo.com.ar
